thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Thalia T

author: Thalia T
title: Thalia T
text: I made three bookings and realised I had made an error with the dates on one of them. Called the company and was able to change the date easily. I had to pay the difference in cost between the two dates, but am very happy with the customer service I received. I recommend Flight Network to anyone trying to decide on a ticketing agency from the countless ones out there.
